BloodOrbAbsorbRange.Description: Range, in centimeters, at which Blood Orbs are absorbed by the killer, i.e. the orbs disappear and the killer gains Demon Mode charge.

BloodOrbAttractRange.Description: Range, in centimeters, at which Blood Orbs start getting attracted by the killer, i.e. start moving towards him, when he's in absorb mode.

BloodOrbAttractAngle.Description: Angle, in degrees, the Blood Orbs must be within of the camera forward in order to be attracted.

BloodOrbAttractSpeed.Description: Speed, in centimeters per second, at which Blood Orbs will move towards the killer when attracted.

BloodOrbSurvivorDropRange.Description: Range, in centimeters, at which survivors should be forced to drop orbs when the killer is in absorb mode. They should also be with the attract angle.

BloodOrbDropAfterCrouchBuffer.Description: Time, in seconds, since the last time the survivor dropped a Blood Orb from crouching before he can drop another one. This exists so survivors cannot spam Blood Orbs by crouching repeatedly.

BloodOrbDropNumOnCrouch.Description: Number of Blood Orbs to drop when an injured player crouches. The drop orbs over time timer is also reset.

BloodOrbDropNumOnGameEvent.Description: Number of Blood Orbs to drop when an injured player performs one of the game events that drop orbs, e.g. vault, dropping a pallet, exiting a locker

BloodOrbDropNumOnHook.Description: Number of Blood Orbs to drop when the camper is hooked.

BloodOrbDropNumOnMissedSkillCheck.Description: Number of Blood Orbs to drop when an injured player misses a skill check.

BloodOrbDropNumOnPassiveDrop.Description: Number of Blood Orbs to drop each time a camper drop orbs passively, i.e. over time when injured.

BloodOrbDropFrequencyAbsorbRange.Description: Time interval, in seconds, at which survivors should drop orbs when in the killer's absorb range. -1 to disable the system.

BloodOrbDropFrequencyInjured.Description: Time interval, in seconds, at which survivors should drop orbs when in the killer's absorb range. -1 to disable the system.

BloodOrbDropPauseAfterUnhookDuration.Description: Time, in seconds, during which a camper won't drop Blood Orbs after getting unhooked. The next orb will actually drop after the BloodOrbDropInterval after this delay, since we reset the timer after we unpause.

BloodOrbLifetime.Description: Lifetime, in seconds, of Blood Orbs. -1 means infinite.

BloodOrbMaxNumber.Description: The maximum number of Blood Orbs that can be in the game at the same time. -1 for unlimited.

BloodOrbVisibilityRangeAbsorbMode.Description: Range, in centimeters, at which Blood Orbs are visible to the Oni when in Absorb Mode.

BloodOrbVisibilityRangeOutOfAbsorbMode.Description: Range, in centimeters, at which Blood Orbs are visible to the Oni when not in Absorb Mode.

BloodOrbVisibilityRangeAura.Description: Range, in centimeters, at which Blood Orbs' auras are visible to the Oni at all times.

DemonModeChargeRate.Description: Demon Mode charge gained per second while not in Demon Mode.

DemonModeDepleteRate.Description: Demon mode charge lost per second while in Demon mode. Should be negative to lose charge. Demon mode will end when charge reaches 0.

DemonModeChargePerBloodOrb.Description: Amount of Demon Mode charge to add per Blood Orb absorbed.

DemonModeChargeToAddOnAttack.Description: Amount of Demon Mode charge to gain when attacking a healthy survivor to injured.

DemonModeAutoChargeThreshold.Description: If the Demon Mode charge goes above this amount when not in Demon Mode, we stop the passive charge so that we can't go all the way just on passive charge.

DemonModeSecondsToRemoveOnPickUp.Description: Amount of Demon Mode seconds to remove when the killer pick up a survivor

DemonModeSecondsToRemoveOnDownSurvivor.Description: Amount of Demon Mode seconds to remove when the killer pick up a survivor while in Demon Mode.

DemonModeDespawnBloodOrbs.Description: Whether to despawn all Blood Orbs when Demon Mode is ready.

DemonModeActivationDuration.Description: Duration, in seconds, of the activation animation when entering Demon Mode.

DemonModeActivationGamepadYawScale.Description: Yaw scale during the activation animation.

DemonModeActivationChargeTime.Description: Time, in seconds, for which the player must hold down the input to start Demon Mode.

DemonModeCooldownDuration.Description: Duration, in seconds, of the Demon Mode cooldown.

DemonModeEndOnStunByPalletBelowThreshold.Description: If the Oni gets stunned by a pallet with less than this much Demon Mode charge, it will end the Demon Mode, so that we can play the Demon Mode to Idle stun animation

DemonModeEndOnStunByPalletAboveThreshold.Description: If the Oni gets stunned by a pallet with more than this much Demon Mode charge, it will end the Demon Mode. Used when we get stunned during activation.

OniDemonAttack_SecondsToCharge.Description: Total charge duration of the demon attack.

OniDemonModeThresholdForPowerAttack.Description: Percent through the charge before a basic attack becomes the power attack.

OniPowerAttackDamageDuringSuccessPhaseDu.Description: Duration we should do continued hit detection during the success hitting phase. (As the Oni is continuously slamming his weapon)

OniPowerAttackHitGamepadYawScale.Description: Scales the yaw during the hit phase.

OniPowerAttackHitMouseYawScale.Description: Scales the yaw during the hit phase.

OniPowerAttackCooldownGamepadYawScale.Description: Scales the yaw during the cooldown phase.

OniPowerAttackCooldownGamepadPitchScale.Description: Scales the pitch during the cooldown phase.

OniPowerAttackOpenYawLimit.Description: Limit how fast the oni can turn during the open phase of his attack. Set to -1 to disable.

OniPowerAttackOpenMaxTurnAngle.Description: Limit the max angle that the Oni can turn during the open phase of his power attack. Set to -1 to disable.

DemonModeDashChargeTime.Description: Time, in seconds, for which the Oni's Dash ability must be charged before activating.

DemonModeDashYawScale.Description: Yaw scale during the Oni's dash. Doesn't apply when charging.

DemonModeDashChargeCost.Description: Amount of Demon Mode charge to lose per second while dashing.

DemonModeDashCooldownDuration.Description: Duration, in seconds, of the cooldown after the Oni's Dash, if not chaining to an attack.
